General.Name: Wooree E&L Co. Ltd
General.Description: Wooree E&L Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, develops, manufactures, and sells light emitting diode (LED) products in South Korea and internationally. It offers LED BLU package and lighting package products, as well as LED modules for notebook, monitors, and TV. Wooree E&L Co., Ltd. was founded in 2008 and is based in Ansan, South Korea.
